page.title: 10Burton Sportsday
page.content: Burton sportsday consisted of many events in which the older pupils competed.The pupils were divided into 4 groups red,yellow,green and blue.The younger pupils had made badges with the 4 colours on them,and sat on the grass supporting their team.The pupils parents watched the races and supported the children as they ran. Some events were the egg and spoon race,relays,obstacle course,sack race,100m flat race and High jump.After the childrens events they had invitation races for parents.This the pupils seemed to enjoy most.The team that won the cup was the yellow team. Highcliffe sportsday was similar in the sense that the school was divided into 6 groups each having a colour. Highcliffe had all track and field events and many records were broken.
